TGMA3.SA.summary: Tegma GestÃ£o LogÃ­stica S.A. provides logistics, transportation, and warehouse services in Brazil. It operates through two divisions, Automotive Logistics and Integrated Logistics. The Automotive Logistics division engages in the transportation of vehicles, and management of yard; transfer and distribution of zero-kilometer, new, and used vehicle; storage of vehicles; and provision of pre delivery inspection, and center for automotive/multi-brand services. The Integrated Logistics division provides transportation, storage, inventory management, and similar services. It serves automotive, consumer goods, chemicals, and household appliances sectors. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in SÃ£o Bernardo do Campo, Brazil.
